author: lundblad
msg: * STATUS (r14736): Add r14775, adjusting description and votes appropriately.

author: lundblad
msg: Avoid locking the whole WC in svn lock/unlock.
NOTE: This still locks too much, but fixing that is more complicated.
This at least avoids the worst performance problems in common cases.
* subversion/libsvn_client/locking_commands.c (organize_lock_targets): Lock
the common parent to the depth of the deepest target.

author: philip
msg: Add an XFail test for locking switched files.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/lock_tests.py
(lock_switched_files): New test.
(test_list): XFail lock_switched_files.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2153: wc-to-url copies would wrongly include deleted items.
Thanks to Ben Collins-Sussman for various helpful hints.
Original patch by kfogel, tested and modified by me.
NOTE: This was first committed in r14738, but later reverted since it
triggered a bug in FSFS (see r14770).
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(harvest_committables): If in copy_mode, request deleted entries
too, and set the SVN_CLIENT_COMMIT_ITEM_DELETE flag on them.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/copy_tests.py
(mixed_wc_to_url): Extend this test to include a deleted file.

author: fabien
msg: French translation update for r14771.
* subversion/po/fr.po:
Merged pot file.
